title: Random and Frequent Disconnects
body: Just played a game where for the first half of it, probably, I was constantly disconnecting. Eventually it stopped and I could play properly again, resulting in a win, but I felt it was still important to mention it here. I am pretty certain it was not related to my internet, as I wasn't being disconnected from Discord and there was no indication that I had lost my internet connection.

replies.body: You can still have normal use of the internet, but problems specifically staying connected to a specific server.  In this case, it sounds like there could have been an issue maintaining comms with our game server.  Just in case, I suggest using the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tune up your network so it doesn't happen again.  Hope that helps!
